Literature.Title: In-depth Proteomics and Natural Peptidomics Analyses Reveal Antibacterial Peptides in Human Endometrial Fluid

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (42.3%) toCasecidin 17. A putative AMP as the cleavage mechanism in vivo remains elucidated.Activity: Active against E. faecalis CECT 481 (MIC 16-32 ug/ml), S. aureus MRSA LPV+ (64-128 ug/ml).
